bibl.title: Royal Ideology. 1 and 2 Maccabees and Egypt.
bibl.note: Honors and Strategies of Legitimation: Benefactions. - Honors and Strategies of Legitimation: Commemoration of Military Victories during Festivals. - A Dynasty of Rulers. - A Divinely Sanctioned History of Deliverance. - Echoes of Ptolemaic Royal Ideology in 2 Maccabees: The Monthly Celebration of the King's Birthday. - Echoes of Ptolemaic Royal Ideology in 2 Maccabees: The Sword of Victory.
